resources.string: Correlation Co-efficient Definition:\n\n A measure of the strength of linear association between two variables. Correlation will always between -1.0 and +1.0. If the correlation is positive, we have a positive relationship. If it is negative, the relationship is negative.

Where,

N = N =Number of values or elements

 X = First Score

 Y = Second Score

 ΣXY = Sum of the product of first and Second Scores

 ΣX = Sum of First Scores

 ΣY = Sum of Second Scores

 ΣX2 = Sum of square First Scores

 ΣY2 = Sum of square Second Scores
